SEARCH
Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class SalesReportService

java.lang.Object
com.gang60.SalesReportService
public class SalesReportService extends Object
Service class for handling database queries related to sales reports. All methods are static and interact with the database to fetch sales data.

  • Method Details

    • getTodayMetrics

      public static SalesReportService.SalesMetrics getTodayMetrics()
      Retrieves sales metrics for the current day.
      Returns:
      SalesMetrics object containing today's sales data.

    • getMonthMetrics

      public static SalesReportService.SalesMetrics getMonthMetrics()
      Retrieves sales metrics for the last 30 days.
      Returns:
      SalesMetrics object containing last month's sales data.

    • getHourlySales

      public static List<SalesReportService.HourlySalesData> getHourlySales()
      Retrieves hourly sales data for the current day.
      Returns:
      List of HourlySalesData objects for each hour with sales.

    • getDailySales

      public static List<SalesReportService.DailySalesData> getDailySales()
      Retrieves daily sales data for the last 30 days.
      Returns:
      List of DailySalesData objects for each day with sales.

    • getPopularMenuItems

      public static List<SalesReportService.PopularItem> getPopularMenuItems(boolean todayOnly, int limit)
      Retrieves popular menu items based on quantity sold.
      Parameters:
      todayOnly - if true, only today's data is considered; otherwise last 30 days
      limit - maximum number of items to return
      Returns:
      List of PopularItem objects representing popular menu items.

    • getPopularModifiers

      public static List<SalesReportService.PopularItem> getPopularModifiers(boolean todayOnly, int limit)
      Retrieves popular modifiers/add-ons based on quantity added.
      Parameters:
      todayOnly - if true, only today's data is considered; otherwise last 30 days
      limit - maximum number of modifiers to return
      Returns:
      List of PopularItem objects representing popular modifiers.

    • getSalesByEmployee

      public static Map<String,BigDecimal> getSalesByEmployee(boolean todayOnly)
      Retrieves sales totals grouped by employee.
      Parameters:
      todayOnly - if true, only today's data is considered; otherwise last 30 days
      Returns:
      Map of employee names to their total sales amounts.

    • getSalesByPaymentMethod

      public static Map<String,BigDecimal> getSalesByPaymentMethod(boolean todayOnly)
      Retrieves sales totals grouped by payment method.
      Parameters:
      todayOnly - if true, only today's data is considered; otherwise last 30 days
      Returns:
      Map of payment method names to total sales amounts

    • getInventoryUsage

      public static List<SalesReportService.InventoryUsageData> getInventoryUsage(boolean todayOnly, int limit)
      Retrieves inventory usage data based on ingredients used in sold menu items.
      Parameters:
      todayOnly - if true, only today's data is considered; otherwise last 30 days
      limit - maximum number of ingredients to return
      Returns:
      List of InventoryUsageData objects representing ingredient usage.
